entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
